name: Contract With The Devil
description: Welcome to the world where mysticism and reality, past and present, good and evil are united in a single whole!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Processor: 1500 MHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 1419 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 2000 MHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 1419 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This is actually a pretty good HOG. The graphics are good and for the price it includes both Steam cards and Steam achievements! I am only half an hour in but enjoying it and recommend it to others who enjoy HOG's to pass the time.
i would like a refund. the game will not allow me to continue.
